content: > this pattern is available for free on my blog 1 the downloadable pdf listed for sale contains the full pattern including any tutorial photos in one printable file without advertisements celebrate autumn at your table with the fall leaves crochet cutlery holder pattern this charming design features textured leaf details and cozy fall colors creating the perfect handmade touch for your thanksgiving or autumn gatherings quick to make and endlessly festive these crochet cutlery holders bring warmth and handmade beauty to every place setting **yarn** lion brand yarns wool ease was used for these thanksgiving crochet cutlery holders this project was our october 2025 mini-mystery crochet along project 2 fall / thanksgiving crochet flatware holder design is an a crocheted simplicity original design join the a crocheted simplicity crochet community group on facebook to stay up to date with new releases giveaways sales and testing opportunities https //www facebook com/groups/906744872727855/ you can also find me on etsy a crocheted simplicity jennifer renaud all of my patterns are written in standard american terms unless noted otherwise please note that due to the nature of digital files i cannot take any refunds however i do offer customer support and will try my best to help you with the instructions © 2025 designed by jennifer renaud aka a crocheted simplicity all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are property of a crocheted simplicity the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and charity sales of finished items are also permitted credit given to a crocheted simplicity is greatly appreciated no part of this document may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from jennifer renaud 1 https //www acrochetedsimplicity com/crochet-cutlery-holder-pattern/ 2 https //www acrochetedsimplicity com/category/mini-mystery-crochet-along/
